version="8550"><ns2:id>84467ca0-1688-4586-89df-08a11a7a20e4</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>Service_Call1</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>28ac95cc-79d6-4ae3-8591-db7490b6c706</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@label</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>Service Call</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>b4b13074-c80e-456f-86ed-e363b40c2162</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@helpText</ns2:optionName><ns2:value></ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>8e3f96c3-dd1f-47fc-892a-9d6153c5afd0</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@labelVisibility</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>SHOW</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>ce0dba98-efa8-4d29-8c1d-9f887693c825</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>attachedService</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>1.7ffee915-a2d9-4a1e-abc0-3447de01e395</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>b6726225-14c4-42d7-8f42-23beb537df58</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>inputData</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>tw.options.LIMIID</ns2:value><ns2:valueType>dynamic</ns2:valueType></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>06f96956-7150-43ba-8343-5ec885e5db9e</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>autoRun</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>true</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>e6453527-bd0c-42c1-8641-4779f653ec2d</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>eventON_SVCRESULT</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>try {
//alert(me.getData().length());
if (me.getData() && me.getData().items.length > 0){
var array1 = [];
var array2 = [];
for (var m=0; m < me.getData().items.length; m++){
array1[m] = me.getData().items[m].ParameterName;
array2[m] = me.getData().items[m].ParamID;
}
var corr = me.getData().items[0].Correlation.split('<![CDATA[');
var corr2 = corr[1].split(']]');
var corr3 = corr2[0];
var corrid =    me.getData().items[0].Correlation.split('cpi="');
var corrid1 = corrid[1].split('"');;
var corrid2 = corrid1[0].split('.');
var corrid3 = corrid2[1];
//alert(corrid2);
var params = "";
var snapshot = "";
for (var i =0; i < array1.length; i++){
//alert(array2[i] + " - " + corrid3);
if (array2[i].indexOf(corrid3) != -1){
//array1[i] = array1[i].split('~')[0];
var input = "";
if (me.getData().items[0].UCAImplementationType == "Variable" && array1[i].replace(' ', '')  == "Output"){
 array1[i] = "Input";
} params += "<key>" + array1[i] +"</key> <value>"+ corr3 + "</value>";
}else {
//array1[i] = array1[i].split('~')[0];
var exists = false;
for (var j =0; j < i; j++){
if (array1[j] == array1[i]){
exists = true;
}
}
if (!exists && ${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].UCAImplementationType != "Variable" ){
params += "<key>" + array1[i].replace(' ', '') +"</key><value></value>";
}
}
}

if (${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].snapshotName){
snapshot =  ' snapshot="' + ${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].snapshotName +  '"';
}
${EventMessage_Text_Area1}.setData(["<eventmsg> ",
'\t<event processApp="' + ${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].ProjectAcronym + '"' +  snapshot +  ' ucaname="' + ${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].UCAName +'">',
${EventListenerDettails1}.getData().items[${EventListenerDettails1}.getSelectedIndex()].EventID + "</event> ",
"\t\t<parameters> ",
"\t\t\t<parameter> ",
"\t\t\t\t"+params,
"\t\t\t</parameter> ",
"\t\t</parameters> ",
"</eventmsg>"
].join("\\n"));
${SendMessage_Modal_Section1}.setVisible(true);
}
} catch(e){
console.log(e);
}</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:viewUUID>64.1feaead9-b1d2-4a7e-80a3-22156e6fe8f9</ns2:viewUUID><ns2:binding>tw.options.EventListenerDetails</ns2:binding></ns2:contributions><ns2:contributions xsi:type="ns2:ViewRef"
